title: Looking for normals partner or party who want to win!! Read :D
body:
I'm not to sure what to say I'm level 18 and I'm just simply looking for a good person(s) to play with who know's what to do, I generally have days where I'm in solo que hell and struggle because my team mates are absolutely hopeless, I'm just trying to get to 30 with a decent win rate and it seems as though If you can't carry your team yourself your completely screwed, I hold my own and I do carry a fair few games myself but It's just too hard trying to play solo que myself with the people that some how end up on my team, I usually mid lane or adc, sometimes top, I play those lanes quite well (I just always seem to get kids who go 0-10 in the first 10 minutes and well.. kinda force us to loose, It's every game, Bad kids)
So if anyone else is keen to win and feels confident skill wise, Summoner name - LusterStrife

replies.body:
Im level 21 and uhh yeah i've been put in your position quite a bit lately having to carry the game but sometimes it gets boring using my good champs. Im confident I can play well but when I get put into uncomfortable roles with new champions, I tend to not do too well. But don't worry too much about that because i'll let you guys know if I cant play a certain champ or role very well.. and the only role i have problems with is jg/supp.

I'll add you. Grouping up during the weekend will net some pretty awesome IP gains
